name: High-Waist Wide-Leg Palazzo
description: Comfortable high-waisted trousers with a wide-leg design, perfect for a casual and stylish look. Ideal for relaxed days or layering with other outfits.

name: High-Waisted Business Palazzo
description: Elegant, high-waisted palazzo trousers designed for business casual looks. Features comfortable fabric, pockets, and a flattering silhouette perfect for summer office wear or professional outings.

name: Tailored Wool-Blend
description: Stylish wool-blend trousers with a tailored fit, offering both elegance and comfort.
